meanings.definition: A protein that is a precursor to collagen.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that tropocollagen helps in making collagen in our body.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying how tropocollagen transforms into collagen for tissue repair.
meanings.sent3: When the tropocollagen met the collagen, they high-fived for their teamwork in building skin.
meanings.sent4: The tropocollagen acted like a builder, laying the foundation for the collagen skyscraper.
meanings.sent5: In the body's construction site, tropocollagen is the first brick laid for the collagen building.

meanings.definition: The basic structural unit of collagen.
meanings.sent1: Tropocollagen forms the essential building blocks of collagen structures.
meanings.sent2: The scientist pointed out the arrangement of tropocollagen in the collagen matrix.
meanings.sent3: At the collagen party, tropocollagen was the DJ spinning the structural tunes.
meanings.sent4: The tropocollagen threads weaved together to create the collagen fabric of the skin.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, tropocollagen looked like tiny Lego pieces assembling the collagen framework.
